Follow the latest advice from the @EnvAgency and avoid driving through flood water üöó #StaySafe https://t.co/PPwcxhxFj2

urls.title: Water rescue teams called out as Storm Christoph floods hit Herefordshire
urls.description: Water rescue teams have been called out overnight as river levels continue to rise in Herefordshire.

text:
#StormChristoph | The river Wye at the Old Bridge in Hereford is currently at 5.15 metres ‚Äì and rising.

@EnvAgency has issued a flood warning for the area and says the predicted peak will be up to 5.3m this evening.

Live updates

urls.title: Flooding - updates
urls.description: The Amber weather warning across the whole of the county means communities across the Derbyshire Dales need to be on flood alert over the coming days. Particular areas of concern highlighted by the Environment Agency are Bakewell, Baslow and Matlock. As always, the big message is BE PREPARED - see the advice on our website.

text:
The @EnvAgency has removed #FloodWarning in our area on the Rivers Wye & Derwent at #Rowsley. Photo is of our teams tackling floods there in early hours.

Now 7 remaining #FloodWarnings in Dales.

üëâ https://t.co/SHUb8P1Yqc https://t.co/IwbXNwikGk
